summary: This document contains due diligence research results performed on Southern Trust Company, Inc. by PWM BIS-RESEARCH, focusing on compliance with AML standards. The search yielded no significant negative media results or alerts, indicating a clean record for the subject company.

persons.name: Himanshu Kirtwani
persons.context: Himanshu Kirtwani prepared the due diligence report for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The due diligence report found no significant negative media results for Southern Trust Company, Inc.
No alerts were generated from the searches conducted on the company.
The report was prepared by Himanshu Kirtwani on August 21, 2018.
The document emphasizes the importance of compliance with AML standards.
There were no court cases or public records found related to the company.
